roleset.name: journal publically and electronically, online journaling
roleset.note: BLOG-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from blog.01-v)
BLOGGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT (from blogging.01-n)

roles.note: Arg 2 benefactive is probably very rare with 'blog' as opposed to 'write,' but perhaps 'He blogged to the world' will come up. (from blog.01-v)

example.name: Long blog
example.text: It's way too long 0-2 *PRO* to blog *T*-2 here.
